dmca.title: [AB-C68143R] Potential Phishing Site; Mirroring of site, Illegal copyright publicatio
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page www.i-vibes.com any of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 2:18:12 p.m. (GMT-6). Legal Response Team ThePlanet.com -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Wednesday, July 05, 2006 12:51 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [AB-C68143R] Potential Phishing Site; Mirroring of site, Illegal copyright publication Subject: [AB-C68143R] Potential Phishing Site; Mirroring of site, Illegal copyright publication Reference: [AB-C68143R] For your review. Does not appear to be phishing. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Potential Phishing Site; Mirroring of site, Illegal copyright publication Added by system at Wednesday, Jul 5 2006 05:08 pm X-MailFrom: lenny.abbott@4pcg.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Wed, 05 Jul 2006 17:08:45 -0500 Received: from adsl-070-148-034-076.sip.jax.bellsouth.net ([70.148.34.76] helo=pcg2) by server1.617.net with esmtp (Exim 4.52) id 1FyFSA-0003tI-IS; Wed, 05 Jul 2006 18:02:39 -0400 From: "Lenny Abbott" To: , Subject: Potential Phishing Site; Mirroring of site, Illegal copyright publication Date: Wed, 5 Jul 2006 18:08:40 -0400 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_015F_01C6A05E.0D05ED20" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2869 Thread-Index: Acagf5JcqKCPMjWySHqLIH6VttChqw== Disposition-Notification-To: "Lenny Abbott" X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - server1.617.net X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [0 0] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - 4pcg.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 69.93.97.2 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of 4pcg.com) client-ip=69.93.97.2; envelope-from=lenny.abbott@4pcg.com; helo=server1.617.net; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Jul 2006 22:08:46.0373 (UTC) FILETIME=[95F41550:01C6A07F] Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 70.87.6.111 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of 4pcg.com) client-ip=70.87.6.111; envelope-from=lenny.abbott@4pcg.com; helo=smtp02.theplanet.com; (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) The site www.i-vibes.com is wrongfully mirroring our corporate site www.4pcg.com . We can only assume that the purpose of this is for improper or illegal activity. Please help us by shutting down this site. i-vibes.com resolves to 69.41.247.76 IP Address 69.41.247.76 is located in Regards, Lenny Abbott, CEO Protective Coatings Group, LLC (904) 378-8693 : (904) 378-8697 fax (904) 704-4796 cell 5587 Commonwealth Ave., Jacksonville, FL 32254 MIME element (text/html)
